CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(Frequency__c,"One-Time"), 0, IF( ISPICKVAL(Frequency__c,"Annual"), Hard_Cost__c , IF( ISPICKVAL(Frequency__c,"Biannual"), Hard_Cost__c * 2 , IF( ISPICKVAL(Frequency__c,"Quarterly"), Hard_Cost__c * 4 , IF( ISPICKVAL(Frequency__c,"Monthly"), Hard_Cost__c * 12, IF( ISPICKVAL(Frequency__c,"Weekly"), Hard_Cost__c * 52, 0))))))
CustomField.label: Annual Recurring Hard Cost
